Official Cantonese translations of English names for British officials
response: | 14 (29 July 1907 — 16 March 1912) || Sir Frederick LUGARD, later Lord Lugard || 盧吉, also translated as 盧嘉 (often mistaken for and mistranslated as 盧押 or Charles Luard)
